thread.title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces release of Watches & Clocks for Tennis Players and Tennis Lovers
thread.title_full: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces release of Watches & Clocks for Tennis Players and Tennis Lovers

author: prbuzz.com
title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces release of Watches & Clocks for Tennis Players and Tennis Lovers
text:
Los Angeles, CA (PRBuzz) October 20, 2015 -- WatchBuddy® Timepieces ( www.lovableproducts.com ) - one of the nation’s finest and most popular brands of Theme Watches and Wall Clocks -- proudly announces the release of a collection of Watches and Clocks targeting Tennis Players and Tennis Lovers! They are great for Christmas and Hanukah gifts!
Each of these finely crafted precision timepieces is graced with a beautiful dial picture of Tennis Players (Man and/or Woman), or Iconic Image Collages such as Tennis Racket and Ball, Court or Net.
Thus WatchBuddy® Timepieces magically transform watches & clocks from mere timepieces into delightful and joyful Objects of Delight for Tennis Lovers!
For further information about the WatchBuddy - Tennis Lover’s Watches - click here and for Clocks - click here . Additionally the search tool in the right upper hand corner is very helpful to locate the desired item.
WatchBuddy Watch and Clocks are also featured on many major online shopping venues such as Amazon.com. Most noteworthy is that WatchBuddy’s Store - All Lovable Products by WatchBuddy – is one of the highest rated seller’s on Amazon.com based on Customer Satisfaction Ratings and Customer Service Metrics.
_ _ _ _
About WatchBuddy® Brand Products:
WatchBuddy® is a registered trademark brand of watches, jewelry and fashion accessories held by GreatMerchants.com, Inc., a large group of web based and brick & mortar businesses bringing unique, innovative and creative products and services to consumers.
